thread.section_title: David Sklar & Associates Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of David Sklar & Associates Inc. | davidsklar.com
thread.title: Jacqueline Williams
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Jacqueline Williams

author: Jacqueline Williams
title: Jacqueline Williams
text:
I am so happy that I saw the advertisement on CP 24 and called David Sklar & Associates. My representative Jackie was professional, knowledgeable, and friendly. Jackie give me information on the services offered by David Sklar which made me make the informed decision. No more collection calls. I will recommend David Sklar & Associates to all my friends and family and I would hope that they get Jackie as their representative.
Jacqueline PE
